description: This table contains claims information from Claim Information (CLM) records for Hospital and Professional Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: KIDMED_IMMUNI_C_NAME
columns.description:
The last immunization date for the KidMed visit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes, Status Current


No, Medically contraindicated


No, Parent Refusal


No, Off Schedule

columns.name: KIDMED_SUSPECTED_YN
columns.description:
Whether there are suspected conditions, for the KidMed visit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_PROV_FST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's last name for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_PROV_LAST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's first name for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_PROV_PH
columns.description: The referred-to provider's phone number for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_APPT_DT
columns.description: The appointment date for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_REASON
columns.description: The appointment reason for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The appointment type for the first referral for the KidMed visit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Referral Offsite


Referral In-house

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_PROV_FST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's last name for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_PROV_LAST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's first name for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_PROV_PH
columns.description: The referred-to provider's phone number for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_APPT_DT
columns.description: The appointment date for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_REASON
columns.description: The appointment reason for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The appointment type for the second referral for the KidMed visit.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: KIDMED_R1_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_PROV_FST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's last name for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_PROV_LAST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's first name for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_PROV_PH
columns.description: The referred-to provider's phone number for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_APPT_DT
columns.description: The appointment date for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_REASON

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_TYPE_C_NAME

The appointment type for the third referral for the KidMed visit.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: KIDMED_R1_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: SPARCS_START_DATETIME
columns.description: The start date and time of the patient's presence in the operating room.

columns.name: SPARCS_END_DATETIME
columns.description: The end date and time of the patient's presence in the operating room.

columns.name: SPARCS_ANESTHESIA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of anesthesia administered during the stay.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Local Anesthesia


General Anesthesia


Regional Anesthesia


Other


No Anesthesia

columns.name: SPARCS_EXEMPT_UI_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code which identifies a discharge from a unit within the facility that is exempt from Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) reimbursement.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Alcohol Rehabilitation


Alternate Level of Care


Comprehensive Psychiatric Emergency Program Observation


Drug Rehabilitation


Epilepsy


All Services at Hospital are Exempt


Medical Rehabilitation


Non-DRG Billable Claim


Psychiatric


HIV-AIDS


Traumatic Brain Injury


Ventilator Dependent

columns.name: AMBL_PICK_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the ambulance pick-up location address country.

columns.name: AMBL_DROP_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the ambulance drop-off location address country.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AMBL_PICK_CNTRY_C_NAME

columns.name: CLIENT_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether the patient is a new or existing client.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: INCOME_AMT
columns.description: The patient's annual income.

columns.name: NUM_PEOPLE_SUPPORTD
columns.description: This item is used to store the number of people financially supported by the patient.

columns.name: ML_PRIM_BRTH_CTRL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to store the primary method of male birth control being used by the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PRACTITNR_LVL_CD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to store the medical practitioner level code of the practitioner that's seeing the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PAYMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to store whether the patient made a full, partial, or no payment for the visit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: FAM_PLANNG_ELIG_DT
columns.description: The date the patient became eligible for family planning insurance.

columns.name: INSURANCE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The family planning insurance type used by the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the employer record for this Workers' Comp claim.

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: CLINICAL_TRIAL_NUM
columns.description: The National Clinical Trial (NCT) number.

columns.name: RESUB_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Record the reason for the claim resubmission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: OVRIDE_OHIP_MASTER_NUM
columns.description: The override master number for Ontario Health Insurance Plan (OHIP).

columns.name: OVRIDE_DON_REC_OHIP_NUM

Passenger


Pedestrian


Cyclist

 No Entries Defined

The main activity of the injured person, or the type of situation the injured person was in, at the time of injury.

 No Entries Defined

The activity, contact, or influence that caused the injury to occur.

 No Entries Defined

 No Entries Defined

 No Entries Defined

columns.name: INJURY_MUNICIP_C_NAME

The municipality where the injury took place.

 No Entries Defined

 No Entries Defined

Yes


No


Unknown

Indicates the machinery or equipment being used at the time of the work-related injury.

 No Entries Defined

 No Entries Defined

Type of product involved in the injury.

 No Entries Defined

Whether the product that led to injury was defective.
